Bottleneck management Method to identify bottleneck activities within an activity, process or system with the smallest capacity relative to the demand, thereby controlling the speed of the entire system/organization. See also “Theory of constraints”. Brainstorming Activity designed to stimulate open, free-flowing and creative thought within a group. Often used as an aid in planning and problem solving. Bulletin boards System (electronic, paper or other media) that enables users to send or read messages, files, and other data that are of general interest and addressed to no particular
